message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I'd like to get a good deal, but I'm willing to pay a premium for this product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to pay a premium for the product. However, I'm not quite ready to accept your offer yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a great investment.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $11500. I'm willing to pay $11000, which is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make a slight adjustment to our previous offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11750. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the product's value to you and my initial asking price.
I appreciate your willingness to make a compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $11750. I'm willing to pay $11250, which I think is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another adjustment to our previous offers. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11350. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my initial asking price. I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, so I hope we can come to an agreement soon.
I appreciate your willingness to make another adjustment, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $11350. I'm willing to pay $11000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay for this product.

I understand your maximum price, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11200. This is my final offer, as I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I hope we can come to an agreement soon.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I've decided to go with a different option. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product, which is the price I could get from John. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
